title: {Suggestion} Zac Buff
body:
Uhm, I'm still a bit newer to the boards and such. But I figured this is were I post my suggestions for general stuff (please redirect me if there is another place).

I'm still newer to the game but I do like Zac, I like his skill set, his general look, and his playstyle. However, as I've been told, he is just not as good as other junglers. So I took some time to think about how exactly he could be changed in a way that's not overpowered. I began to look at the engagements I would be in and what would happen in them.  The issue I find is that his early game ganking potential is weak. When it comes to the mid and late game everything is fine, though the issue is getting to the mid/late game. 

The reason I've been led to believe that his (early) ganking potential is poor is that many times I gank they escape with below 50 health. Not just one or two times, its the same story in about 70% of my ganks they live with miniscule health. Now if they flash I cna be more lenient towards such a narrow escape, but many champs just kinda walk it off. So I figured, what can be done? 

My idea is that Zac's W is buffed. The buff would be that the Base Damage of his W is Pure and the percent health part of it is still Magic Damage. This would basically mean with a level 5 W Zac would do about 20-40 more damage per W.

I don't think this is overpowered, I just think that it's enough to give him a stronger presence during the early game.

Tell me what you think, and if you think you could close that 50 health gap a different way (not ignite) tell me.
